verses.verse: Now the lot <WH1486> for the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their families <WH4940> reached <WH1961> the border <WH1366> of Edom, <WH9000> southward <WH5045> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> at the extreme <WH7097> south. <WH8486>
And their south <WH5045> border <WH1366> was from the lower end <WH7097> of the Salt <WH4417> Sea, <WH3220> from the bay <WH3956> that turns <WH6437> to the south. <WH5045>

Then it proceeded <WH3318> southward <WH5045> to the ascent <WH4610> of Akrabbim <WH4610> and continued <WH5674> to Zin, <WH6790> then went <WH5927> up by the south <WH5045> of Kadesh-barnea and continued <WH5674> to Hezron, <WH2696> and went <WH5927> up to Addar <WH146> and turned <WH5437> about <WH5437> to Karka. <WH7173>

And it continued <WH5674> to Azmon <WH6111> and proceeded <WH3318> to the brook <WH5158> of Egypt; <WH4714> and the border <WH1366> ended <WH1961> <WH8444> at the sea. <WH3220> This <WH2088> shall be your south <WH5045> border. <WH1366>

And the east <WH9506> border <WH1366> [was] the Salt <WH4417> Sea, <WH3220> as far <WH5704> as the mouth <WH7097> of the Jordan. <WH3383> And the border <WH1366> of the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> was from the bay <WH3956> of the sea <WH3220> at the mouth <WH7097> of the Jordan. <WH3383>

Then the border <WH1366> went <WH5927> up to Beth-hoglah, and continued <WH5674> on the north <WH6828> of Beth-arabah, and the border <WH1366> went <WH5927> up to the stone <WH68> of Bohan <WH932> the son <WH1121> of Reuben. <WH7205>

And the border <WH1366> went <WH5927> up to Debir <WH1688> from the valley <WH6010> of Achor, <WH5911> and turned <WH6437> northward <WH6828> toward <WH413> Gilgal <WH1537> which <WH834> is opposite <WH5227> the ascent <WH4608> of Adummim, <WH131> which <WH834> is on the south <WH5045> of the valley; <WH5158> and the border <WH1366> continued <WH5674> to the waters <WH4325> of En-shemesh, and it ended <WH1961> <WH8444> at En-rogel.

Then the border <WH1366> went <WH5927> up the valley <WH1516> of Ben-hinnom <WH2011> to the slope <WH3802> of the Jebusite <WH2983> on the south <WH5045> (that is, Jerusalem <WH3389>); and the border <WH1366> went <WH5927> up to the top <WH7218> of the mountain <WH2022> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom to the west, <WH3220> which <WH834> is at the end <WH7097> of the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim <WH7497> toward the north. <WH6828>

And from the top <WH7218> of the mountain <WH2022> the border <WH1366> curved <WH9638> to the spring <WH4599> of the waters <WH4325> of Nephtoah <WH5318> and proceeded <WH3318> to the cities <WH5892> of Mount <WH2022> Ephron, <WH6085> then the border <WH1366> curved <WH9638> to Baalah <WH1173> (that is, Kiriath-jearim).

And the border <WH1366> turned <WH5437> about <WH5437> from Baalah <WH1173> westward <WH3220> to Mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> and continued <WH5674> to the slope <WH3802> of Mount <WH2022> Jearim <WH3297> on the north <WH6828> (that is, Chesalon <WH3693>), and went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Beth-shemesh and continued <WH5674> through <WH5674> Timnah. <WH8553>

And the border <WH1366> proceeded <WH3318> to the side <WH3802> of Ekron <WH6138> northward. <WH6828> Then the border <WH1366> curved <WH9638> to Shikkeron <WH7942> and continued <WH5674> to Mount <WH2022> Baalah <WH1173> and proceeded <WH3318> to Jabneel, <WH2995> and the border <WH1366> ended <WH1961> <WH8444> at the sea. <WH3220>

And the west <WH3220> border <WH1366> [was] at the Great <WH1419> Sea, <WH3220> even [its] coastline. <WH1366> This <WH2088> is the border <WH1366> around <WH5439> the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their families. <WH4940>

Now he gave <WH5414> to Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> a portion <WH2506> among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> according <WH413> to the command <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> to Joshua, <WH3091> [namely,] Kiriath-arba, [Arba being] the father of Anak <WH1> (that is, Hebron <WH6061>).

And Caleb <WH3612> drove <WH3423> out from there <WH8033> the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak: <WH6061> Sheshai <WH8344> and Ahiman <WH289> and Talmai, <WH8526> the children <WH3211> of Anak. <WH6061>
Then he went <WH5927> up from there <WH8033> against <WH413> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Debir; <WH1688> now the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> formerly <WH6440> was Kiriath-sepher.
And Caleb <WH3612> said, <WH559> "The one who <WH834> attacks <WH5221> Kiriath-sepher and captures <WH3920> it, I will give <WH5414> him Achsah <WH5915> my daughter <WH1323> as a wife. <WH802>"
And Othniel <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz, <WH7073> the brother <WH251> of Caleb, <WH3612> captured <WH3920> it; so he gave <WH5414> him Achsah <WH5915> his daughter <WH1323> as a wife. <WH802>

And it came <WH1961> about that when she came <WH935> [to him,] she persuaded <WH5496> him to ask <WH7592> her father for a field. <WH1> So she alighted <WH7704> from the donkey, <WH6795> and Caleb <WH2543> said <WH3612> to her, "What <WH559> do you want?"

Then she said, <WH559> "Give <WH5414> me a blessing; <WH1293> since <WH3588> you have given <WH5414> me the land <WH776> of the Negev, <WH5045> give <WH5414> me also springs <WH1543> of water. <WH4325>" So he gave <WH5414> her the upper <WH5942> springs <WH1543> and the lower <WH8482> springs. <WH1543>
This <WH2088> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their families. <WH4940>

Now the cities <WH5892> at the extremity <WH7097> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> toward <WH413> the border <WH1366> of Edom <WH9000> in the south <WH5045> were Kabzeel <WH6909> and Eder <WH9387> and Jagur, <WH3017>
and Kinah <WH7016> and Dimonah <WH1776> and Adadah, <WH5735>
and Kedesh <WH6943> and Hazor <WH2674> and Ithnan, <WH3497>
Ziph <WH2128> and Telem <WH2928> and Bealoth, <WH1175>
and Hazor-hadattah <WH2674> and Kerioth-hezron (that is, Hazor),
Amam <WH538> and Shema <WH8090> and Moladah, <WH4137>
and Hazar-gaddah and Heshmon <WH2829> and Beth-pelet,
and Hazar-shual and Beersheba <WH884> and Biziothiah, <WH964>
Baalah <WH1173> and Iim <WH5864> and Ezem, <WH6107>
and Eltolad <WH513> and Chesil <WH3686> and Hormah, <WH2767>
and Ziklag <WH6860> and Madmannah <WH4089> and Sansannah, <WH5578>
and Lebaoth <WH3822> and Shilhim <WH7978> and Ain <WH5871> and Rimmon; <WH9558> in all, <WH3605> twenty-nine cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
In the lowland: <WH8219> Eshtaol <WH847> and Zorah <WH6881> and Ashnah, <WH823>
and Zanoah <WH2182> and En-gannim, Tappuah <WH8599> and Enam, <WH9408>
Jarmuth <WH3412> and Adullam, <WH5725> Socoh <WH7755> and Azekah, <WH5825>
and Shaaraim <WH8189> and Adithaim <WH5723> and Gederah <WH1449> and Gederothaim; <WH1453> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Zenan <WH6799> and Hadashah <WH2322> and Migdal-gad,
and Dilean <WH1810> and Mizpeh <WH4708> and Joktheel, <WH3371>
Lachish <WH3923> and Bozkath <WH1218> and Eglon, <WH5700>
and Cabbon <WH3522> and Lahmas <WH3903> and Chitlish, <WH3798>
and Gederoth, <WH1450> Beth-dagon and Naamah <WH9337> and Makkedah; <WH4719> sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Libnah <WH3841> and Ether <WH6281> and Ashan, <WH6228>
and Iphtah <WH3316> and Ashnah <WH823> and Nezib, <WH5334>
and Keilah <WH7084> and Achzib <WH392> and Mareshah; <WH4762> nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Ekron, <WH6138> with its towns <WH1323> and its villages; <WH9161>
from Ekron <WH6138> even to the sea, <WH3220> all <WH3605> that were by the side <WH3027> of Ashdod, <WH795> with their villages. <WH9161>

Ashdod, <WH795> its towns <WH1323> and its villages; <WH9161> Gaza, <WH5804> its towns <WH1323> and its villages; <WH9161> as far <WH5704> as the brook <WH5158> of Egypt <WH4714> and the Great <WH1419> Sea, <WH3220> even [its] coastline. <WH1366>
And in the hill <WH2022> country: <WH2022> Shamir <WH8069> and Jattir <WH3492> and Socoh, <WH7755>
and Dannah <WH1837> and Kiriath-sannah (that is, Debir <WH1688>),
and Anab <WH6024> and Eshtemoh <WH851> and Anim, <WH6044>
and Goshen <WH1657> and Holon <WH2473> and Giloh; <WH1542> eleven <WH259> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Arab <WH694> and Dumah <WH1746> and Eshan, <WH824>
and Janum <WH3241> and Beth-tappuah and Aphekah, <WH664>
and Humtah <WH2547> and Kiriath-arba (that is, Hebron <WH2275>), and Zior; <WH6730> nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Maon, <WH4584> Carmel <WH3760> and Ziph <WH2128> and Juttah, <WH3194>
and Jezreel <WH3157> and Jokdeam <WH3347> and Zanoah, <WH2182>
Kain, <WH9515> Gibeah <WH1390> and Timnah; <WH8553> ten <WH6235> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Halhul, <WH2478> Beth-zur and Gedor, <WH1446>
and Maarath <WH4638> and Beth-anoth and Eltekon; <WH515> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), and Rabbah; <WH7237> two <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>
In the wilderness: <WH4057> Beth-arabah, Middin <WH4081> and Secacah, <WH5527>
and Nibshan <WH5044> and the City <WH5898> of Salt <WH5898> and Engedi; <WH5872> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH9161>

Now as for the Jebusites, <WH2983> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> could <WH3201> not drive <WH3423> them out; so the Jebusites <WH2983> live <WH3427> with the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> at Jerusalem <WH3389> until <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
